author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1087: Allowing portal url valve to read custom portal path info from query parameter or http header. With additional properties configuration, this can be enabled.
Currently, rest api pipeline uses these options because there are two separate url spaces in rest url invocations: (1) rest resource request url, (2) portal page context url.
From the ajax developer's view, the request url needs to be just rest resource request url; the portal page path in the context can be passed by query parameter or http header in ajax codes.
